text: During the reign of Ahaz son of Jotham, son of Uzziah, king of Judah, King Rezin of Syria and King Pekah son of Remaliah of Israel marched up to Jerusalem to do battle, but they were unable to prevail against it.
It was reported to the family of David, “Syria has allied with Ephraim.” They and their people were emotionally shaken, just as the trees of the forest shake before the wind.
So the Lord told Isaiah, “Go out with your son Shear Jashub and meet Ahaz at the end of the conduit of the upper pool that is located on the road to the field where they wash and dry cloth.

<st data-num="0559 0413">Tell</st> him, ‘<st data-num="08104" class="">Make sure</st> you <st data-num="08252" class="">stay calm</st>!<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0408" class="">Don’t</st> <st data-num="03372" class="">be afraid</st>. <st data-num="03824 0408">Don’t</st> <st data-num="07401" class="">be intimidated</st><n id="2" /> by <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="02180" class="">stubs</st> of <st data-num="06226" class="">smoking</st> <st data-num="0181" class="">logs</st>,<n id="3" /> or by the <st data-num="02750" class="">raging</st> <st data-num="0639" class="">anger</st> of <st data-num="07526" class="">Rezin</st>, <st data-num="0758" class="">Syria</st>, and the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="07425" class="">Remaliah</st>.

<st data-num="0758" class="">Syria</st> has <st data-num="03289" class="">plotted</st> with <st data-num="0669" class="">Ephraim</st> and the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="07425" class="">Remaliah</st> <st data-num="05921 07451">to bring about</st> your <st data-num="05921 07451">demise</st>.<n id="1" />

They <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>, “Let’s <st data-num="05927" class="">attack</st> <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st>, <st data-num="06973" class="">terrorize</st> it, and <st data-num="01234 0413">conquer</st> it.<n id="1" /> Then we’ll <st data-num="04427" class="">set up</st> the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="02870" class="">Tabeel</st> as <st data-num="08432" class="">its</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>.”<n id="2" />

For this reason the Sovereign Lord says:

“‘It will not take place;

it will not happen.

For Syria’s leader is Damascus,

and the leader of Damascus is Rezin.

Within 65 years Ephraim will no longer exist as a nation.

Ephraim’s leader is Samaria,

and Samaria’s leader is the son of Remaliah.

If your faith does not remain firm,

then you will not remain secure.’”
The Lord again spoke to Ahaz:
“Ask for a confirming sign from the Lord your God. You can even ask for something miraculous.”
But Ahaz responded, “I don’t want to ask; I don’t want to put the Lord to a test.”

So Isaiah <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="08085" class="">Pay attention</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="01004" class="">family</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="01732" class="">David</st>.<n id="4" /> Do you consider it <st data-num="04480">too</st> <st data-num="04592" class="">insignificant</st> to <st data-num="03811" class="">try the patience</st> of <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st>? Is <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> why you are <st data-num="01571" class="">also</st> <st data-num="03811" class="">trying the patience</st> of my <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>?

<st data-num="03651" class="">For this reason</st> the <st data-num="0136">Lord</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">himself</st> will <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> you a <st data-num="0226">confirming sign</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="02009" class="">Look</st>, this<n id="2" /> <st data-num="05959" class="">young woman</st><n id="3" /> is about to <st data-num="02030" class="">conceive</st><n id="4" /> and will <st data-num="03205" class="">give birth</st> to a <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st>. You, young woman, will <st data-num="07121 08034">name</st> him<n id="5" /> <st data-num="06005" class="">Immanuel</st>.<n id="6" />

He will <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="02529" class="">sour milk</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="01706" class="">honey</st>, which will help him <st data-num="03045" class="">know how</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="03988" class="">reject</st> <st data-num="07451" class="">evil</st> and <st data-num="0977" class="">choose</st> <st data-num="02896">what is right</st>.

<st data-num="03588" class="">Here is why</st> this will be so:<n id="1" /> <st data-num="02962" class="">Before</st> the <st data-num="05288" class="">child</st> <st data-num="03045" class="">knows how</st> to <st data-num="03988" class="">reject</st> <st data-num="07451" class="">evil</st> and <st data-num="0977" class="">choose</st> <st data-num="02896">what is right</st>, the <st data-num="0127" class="">land</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">whose</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="06973 06440">fear</st> will <st data-num="05800" class="">be desolate</st>.<n id="3" />
The Lord will bring on you, your people, and your father’s family a time unlike any since Ephraim departed from Judah—the king of Assyria!”
At that time the Lord will whistle for flies from the distant streams of Egypt and for bees from the land of Assyria.

<st data-num="03605" class="">All</st> of them will <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> and <st data-num="05117" class="">make</st> their <st data-num="05117" class="">home</st><n id="1" /> in the <st data-num="05158" class="">ravines</st> between the <st data-num="01327" class="">cliffs</st> and in the <st data-num="05357" class="">crevices</st> of the <st data-num="05553" class="">cliffs</st>, in <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05285" class="">thornbushes</st>, and in <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05097" class="">watering holes</st>.<n id="2" />

At <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">time</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0136" class="">Lord</st> will <st data-num="01548" class="">use</st> a <st data-num="08593" class="">razor</st> <st data-num="07917" class="">hired</st> from the <st data-num="05676" class="">banks</st> of the Euphrates <st data-num="05104" class="">River</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="0804" class="">Assyria</st>, <st data-num="01548" class="">to shave</st> the <st data-num="07218" class="">hair</st> off the <st data-num="07218" class="">head</st> and <st data-num="07272" class="">private parts</st>;<n id="3" /> it will <st data-num="01571" class="">also</st> <st data-num="05595" class="">shave off</st> the <st data-num="02206" class="">beard</st>.

At <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">time</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> will <st data-num="02421" class="">keep alive</st> a <st data-num="05697" class="">young cow</st> from the <st data-num="01241" class="">herd</st> and a <st data-num="08147" class="">couple</st> of <st data-num="06629" class="">goats</st>.

From the <st data-num="07230" class="">abundance</st> of <st data-num="02461" class="">milk</st> they <st data-num="06213" class="">produce</st>,<n id="1" /> he will <st data-num="0398" class="">have</st> <st data-num="02529" class="">sour milk</st> <st data-num="0398" class="">for</st> his <st data-num="0398">meals</st>. <st data-num="03588" class="">Indeed</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">everyone</st> <st data-num="03498" class="">left</st> in the <st data-num="07130" class="">heart</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> will <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="02529" class="">sour milk</st> and <st data-num="01706" class="">honey</st>.

At <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">time</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">where</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st> had <st data-num="01961" class="">been</st> <st data-num="0505" class="">1,000</st> <st data-num="01612" class="">vines</st> worth <st data-num="0505" class="">1,000</st> silver <st data-num="03701" class="">shekels</st> will <st data-num="01961">be overrun</st><n id="2" /> with <st data-num="08068" class="">thorns</st> and <st data-num="07898" class="">briers</st>.

With <st data-num="07198" class="">bow</st> and <st data-num="02678" class="">arrow</st><n id="1" /> people will <st data-num="0935" class="">hunt</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="03605" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be covered</st><n id="3" /> with <st data-num="08068" class="">thorns</st> and <st data-num="07898" class="">briers</st>.
They will stay away from all the hills that were cultivated for fear of the thorns and briers. Cattle will graze there, and sheep will trample on them.
